name: Meathead's Drop a Letter 5 Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
To play a drop a letter quiz, you start with a word, and subtract a letter.  Unscramble to come up with the next answer.  I will tell you when to start adding letters!

Butterfly action; not flutter
One who picks up an object

Ok, it is time to start adding letters.

To have given food
To have run away from something, like what Joseph did to Potipher's wife
Slowly sawed a nail down; organized papers
Stringed instrument; held like a viola or violin
